column2: From the award winning winery, Yamantievs, located in the Thracian Valley, which is the perfect location for grape growing in Bulgaria. This Merlot has ripe black fruit & spice aromas with hints of plum. The palate is silky smooth, with an elegant black fruit & plum-skin tone. The acid & tannin balance is perfect - a silky scaffold holding a dark-fruit heart.  It will enhance any meal with lamb or venison, but is equally at home alongside a spicy mushroom cassoulet.
